quote: Lay low and boss up.
author: King Lowkey Tha Bread Winner

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Open the door of your calmness, and let the footsteps of silence gently enter the temple of all your activities.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: A fish with his mouth closed never gets caught.
author: Fuad Alakbarov

quote: Melanin Poppin' and No Worries!
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: Accept it… Black women are beautiful, pretty, gorgeous, appealing, elegant, attractive, lovely, stunning, and exquisite.
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You only live once, so enjoy the ride.
author: Oliver Gaspirtz

quote: My complexion is exquisite!
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: Englishmen must have an island.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: We all draw breath and life from the same source of creation.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Today is a beautiful day simply because God made it!
author: Jesse Joseph

quote: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
author: Moses

quote: And God said, “Let there be light,” and there was light.
author: Moses

quote: We are God's productions, His compositions.
author: David Jeremiah

quote: Each of us is a masterpiece of God's creation.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Nature is the art of God.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: God loves you and created you in His own image.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Time was God's first creation.
author: Walter Lang

quote: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Keep your breath to cool your porridge.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Realize that if a door closed, it’s because what was behind it wasn’t meant for you.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Sometimes it takes a wrong turn to get you to the right place.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: If something is meant to be, then it will be.
author: Nina Agdal

quote: Life is funny... we never know what's in store for us and time brings on what is meant to be.
author: April Mae Monterrosa

quote: Don't ever wish you were someone else, you were meant to be the way you are exactly.
author: Joey McIntyre

quote: Life is meant to be lived.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Don't die without embracing the daring adventure your life is meant to be.
author: Steve Pavlina

quote: The message coming back at all of us is: live without closure.
author: Terence McKenna

quote: Believe that there's light at the end of the tunnel. Believe that you might be that light for someone else.
author: Kobi Yamada

quote: There is a light at the end of the tunnel, but the way out is through.
author: David Allen

quote: Remember, the light at the end of the tunnel may be you.
author: Aerosmith

quote: Be your own hero.
author: Your World Within

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quote: No duty is more urgent than giving thanks.
author: James Allen

quote: It's Always Darkest Before the Dawn.
author: Joshua Spacht

quote: Gratitude is the most important attitude.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: A thankful heart is a magnet for miracles.
author: Vicki Becker

quote: You don't ever ask a barber whether you need a haircut.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Be awesome. Live life to the fullest. Shoot for the stars and never settle.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: If you can drink from the fountain, why then, should you request for a drink of water from the cup?
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Don’t settle for good when you were destined to be great.
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: Don't settle for a normal life. Not when you can enjoy the wonderful weirdness of being who God created you to be.
author: Craig Groeschel

quote: What you want exists. Don't settle until you get it.
author: Mel Robbins

quote: If life gives you lemons, don’t settle for simply making lemonade – make a glorious scene at a lemonade stand.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Never let anyone dull your sparkle.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Hope is the anchor of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be strong. Even when you can’t be.
author: Saim Ahmed Cheeda

quote: Ultimate hope constitutes the anchor of the soul.
author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: Love is an anchor, it stops you from drifting away.
author: Robert Corbert

quote: Purpose is like an anchor for our awareness.
author: Cynthia Yoder

quote: The strongest anchor is hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A home creates an anchor for the rest of your life.
author: Ant Anstead

quote: The soul would have no rainbow if the eyes had no tears.
author: John Vance Cheney

quote: Wake in the morning with a winged heart and give thanks for another day of loving.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: You light up my world like nobody else.
author: One Direction

quote: Our light shall burn the pathway to the stars.
author: Mladen Đorđević

quote: God always has a perfect plan!
author: Kim Zolciak-Biermann

quote: Whatever happens, happens. It’s all a part of God’s plan.
author: Teddy Bridgewater

quote: I believe that God has a specific plan and reason He created each one of us.
author: Lisa Whelchel

quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Of one thing I am perfectly sure: God's story never ends with ashes.
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: Why accept failure when success is free?
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Knowledge is provided but only to those who need to know.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: If it matters to you, pursue it aggressively.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: All things are obtained by Wisdom and Knowledge.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: I’m not afraid to make mistakes.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Came from the bottom, we aim for the stars.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Use the things that make you angry — as fuel to make you better.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: When you follow your heart, you always win!
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Sometimes the best move is no move.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Sometimes it’s painful to relive the past, but sometimes you gotta relive the past in order to heal from it.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Man, all lives matter.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Those who don't know the value of loyalty, won't understand the cost of betrayal.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Take me as I am or not at all!
author: Kevin Gates

quote: Scars you refuse to hide can become lighthouses that warn other people who are headed to the same rocks you crashed on.
author: Jon Acuff

quote: To survive a war, you gotta become war.
author: Rambo

quote: Sir, do we get to win this time?
author: Rambo

quote: You're not hunting him. He's hunting you.
author: Trautman

quote: Hey. If you're looking for trouble, you've come to the right place buddy.
author: Deputy Sergeant Arthur Gault

quote: Setting him up for you? That's like bringing the pigeons to the cat.
author: Trautman

quote: Like you said, Colonel, he went home.
author: Murdock

quote: I finally came home, to defend the only family I've ever known. But all she's got is me. She's coming home.
author: Rambo

quote: This is what it feels like!
author: Rambo

quote: We can build anything in our imagination that's where all creation begins in your life.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: One difference between successful people and all the rest is that successful people take action.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: You must make your dream a priority in order for it to become your life.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Don't be a VICTIM of negative self talk - remember YOU are listening.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: You are the mental architect of your own destiny.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Your real purpose in life is to develop yourself. To successfully do this you must always be working toward a goal.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: The Universe works better when you work with it.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: The choice is always yours. Your perception is your reality.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Visualization is where everything starts.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: The good you find in others is a reflection of the good that is in yourself.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: The images fixed in your subconscious mind control your vibration and your vibration controls what you attract.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Eliminate the word “failure” from your vocabulary. You can always get up and go at it again tomorrow.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: I think I'm cool. That's all that matters.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I'm an optimistic guy. I'm one of those big dreamers. I'm one of those kids with that annoying imagination.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I'm not hip-hop. I'm Tyler.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I never had a drink in my life. I don't smoke or anything.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I'm a pretty nice dude. I have fun, and people take it the wrong way.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: For the record, I don't worship the devil. I just hate religion.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I don't like being put in a box. I just make music, you know?
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I'm a really, really, smart, multi-talented almost-genius, who's very annoying.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I just want everyone to be awesome. That’s all it is. I want everyone to be cool in their way.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: I wanna be your number one.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: You make my earth quake.
author: Tyler, the Creator

quote: Starting over can be challenging, but also it can be a great opportunity to do things differently.
author: Catherine Pulsifer

quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly.
author: Chuang Tzu

quote: Even the greatest was once a beginner. Don’t be afraid to take that first step.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do!
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Beginnings are usually scary and endings are usually sad, but it’s everything in between that makes it all worth living.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Instead of letting your hardships and failures discourage or exhaust you, let them inspire you.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.
author: John Green

quote: Girls are capable of doing everything men are capable of doing. Sometimes they have more imagination than men.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: Like what you do, and then you will do your best.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: I like to learn. That’s an art and a science.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: Math. It's just there ... you're either right or you're wrong. That's what I like about it.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: Everything is physics and math.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: You lose your curiosity when you stop learning.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: If you attack the problem right, you'll get the answer.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: Once you took the first step, anything was possible.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: When things go wrong don't go with them.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Difficult roads always lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: My message is really that racism has no place in the hearts and minds of our children.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: We have tolerance, respect, and equality in our written laws but not in the hearts of some of our people.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: I was the first black child to desegregate the all-white William Frantz Elementary School in Louisiana in 1960.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: None of our kids come into the world knowing anything about disliking one another.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: I like to share my story with children, and they are amazed by the story.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: You cannot look at a person and judge him or her by the color of their skin.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: Evil looks like you and I. I know what evil looks like, and I know that it comes in all shades and colors.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: Kids come into the world with clean hearts, fresh starts.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: When it comes to love, never be reckless with someone else’s heart.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: Love is Love. Better to Love than Hate!!!
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: Bravery knows no age or gender.
author: Ruby Bridges

quote: I never lose. I either win or learn.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: We are all here for some special reason. Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Constant effort and frequent mistakes are the stepping stones to genius.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Your circumstances don’t define you, your decisions do. So keep your head up and keep climbing.
author: Tavi Castro

quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: You can’t climb uphill by thinking downhill thoughts.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: All chaos is divine intervention.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: You have to make room for the things that God has in store. Be patient as you grow through the process. Trust Him.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Smile, things are working out. You may not see it now, but just know God is directing you to a much greater happiness.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Anything under God’s control is never out of control.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: God has control over everything, and obviously, everything to everyone is God-given.
author: Troy Polamalu

quote: No matter what you’re going through there’s no pit so deep that God can’t reach in and get you out.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: The circumstances we ask God to CHANGE are often the circumstances God is using to CHANGE US.
author: Mark Batterson

quote: The more we understand God’s sovereignty, the more our prayers will be filled with thanksgiving.
author: R.C. Sproul

quote: We may not see it now but God is in control and has a reason for everything.
author: William Hemsworth

quote: No matter how tough the situation may be, trust God. He is trustworthy. He can still turn your life around.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: I am not satisfied in making money for myself. I endeavor to provide employment for hundreds of the women of my race.
author: Madam C.J. Walker

quote: Perseverance is my motto!
author: Madam C.J. Walker

quote: Love’s language is imprecise, fits more like mittens than gloves.
author: Madam C.J. Walker

quote: People are ugly not in their face but in their thoughts.
author: Madam C.J. Walker

quote: Hair is power. You can’t imagine what it is like to lose it.
author: Madam C.J. Walker

quote: Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Difficult times produce strong men and women. Keep on your struggle to achieve your dreams!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Stay strong. Stand up. Have a voice.
author: Shawn Johnson

quote: Don’t hide your scars, they make you who you are.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You were given this life because you are strong enough to live it.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: To do a dull thing with style - now that's what I call art.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: The poem has some value, believe me. It keeps you from going totally mad.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: The cat is the beautiful devil.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: People don't need love. What they need is success in one form or another. It can be love but it needn't be.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Dogs and angels are not very far apart.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Goodness can be found sometimes in the middle of hell.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Justice is everywhere and it's working.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Let' em learn or let' em die.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Love it or leave it.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: The whole world is caught in her glance and at last the universe is magnificent.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: People lack originality.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: She's mad, but she's magic. There's no lie in her fire.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Let from this month onwards your days become more happier, fulfilling, purposeful, satisfying & joyful.
author: Rajesh Goyal

quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: If people just took it a day at a time, they'd be a lot happier.
author: Stephen King

quote: I believe everything has a solution, and I take it one day at a time or one thing at a time.
author: Lisa Vidal

quote: Live one day at a time and make it a masterpiece.
author: Dale West

quote: Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: Take life on life’s terms – one day at a time. And have fun while you’re doing it.
author: Joe Perry

quote: The future comes one day at a time. So don’t fear and try to solve all the worries and problems of the future today.
author: Dean Acheson

quote: A battle is a day of your life. So we do one day at a time in self-discovery.
author: Frederick Lenz

quote: Sail through the good days, and on bad days pick a spot of blue sky to steer toward.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: My philosophy is to take one day at a time. I don’t worry about the future. Tomorrow is even out of sight for me.
author: Bobby Darin

quote: God is good, not because of the wonderful, but the other way around. The wonderful is, because God is good.
author: Kirk Manton

quote: God is good all the time. Every time.
author: Russell Wilson

quote: Life will try its hardest to pull you back to the toxic norm… But don’t give up on the person you’re becoming.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Never allow a struggle to turn your sky into a ceiling. You must believe there's always a way.
author: Kristen Butler

quote: One small crack does not mean that you are broken, it means that you were put to the test and you didn’t fall apart.
author: Linda Poindexter

quote: The great secret of getting what you want from life is knowing what you want and believing you can have it.
author: Epictetus

quote: You must tell yourself, ‘no matter how hard it is, or how hard it gets, I’m going to make it.’
author: Les Brown

quote: Just because something is hard doesn’t mean it’s impossible.
author: Lysa TerKeurst

quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: All right, let's see what this thing can do.
author: Brian

quote: You know, I like you. But I still gotta kill you. It's my job.
author: Enrique

quote: What'd you expect? You didn't just play with fire, you soaked the matches in gasoline.
author: Han

quote: A real driver knows exactly what's in his car.
author: Dom

quote: You don't need to send a man to do a woman's job.
author: Gisele Harabo

quote: Dominic Toretto, you don't know me. But you're about to.
author: Deckard Shaw

quote: I may not remember anything, but I know one thing about myself. Nobody makes me do anything I don't want to.
author: Letty

quote: Hey, my man, I need you to turn this plane around.
author: Roman Pearce

quote: Cars can't fly, Dom, cars can't fly!
author: Brian

quote: Want to go for a drive?
author: Mia

quote: A war is coming to us whether we like it or not. If a war is coming, we're gonna face it on the streets we know best.
author: Dom

quote: Yo, shrinkage! We've got a sub to catch. Get in!
author: Hobbs

quote: All my life I've lived in your shadow... Now you're gonna dwell in mine.
author: Jakob

quote: My name is Boba Fett.
author: Boba Fett

quote: No hard feelings. It's just business. Take it from an ex-bounty hunter, don't work for scugholes. It's not worth it.
author: Boba Fett

quote: Next time don't touch my buttons.
author: Boba Fett

quote: If you do not know who I am, then why did you send this man to assassinate me.
author: Boba Fett

quote: We will give you each a black melon. You will survive on its milk as these people do. Now go.
author: Boba Fett

quote: You are foolish to waste your kindness on this dumb creature. No lower life form is worth going hungry for, friend.
author: Boba Fett

quote: Boba Fett isn't available.
author: Boba Fett

quote: You have a lot to learn. Unfortunately for you, your time for learning is over.
author: Boba Fett

quote: Everyone dies... but since no one has paid me to kill you... sleep well.
author: Boba Fett

quote: Tomorrow I'll collect another bounty and you'll be dead.
author: Boba Fett

quote: Mama Fett didn't raise any fools. Strictly speaking, my mama was a birthing pod, but you get the point.
author: Boba Fett

quote: You can run. But you'll only die tired.
author: Boba Fett

quote: By changing course. When the path you walk always leads back to yourself, you never get anywhere.
author: Master Oogway

quote: When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Maybe it can… If you are willing to guide it, to nurture it. To believe in it.
author: Master Oogway

quote: There are no accidents.
author: Master Oogway

quote: My old friend, the panda will never fulfill his destiny, nor you a, until you let go of the illusion of control.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Nothing is impossible.
author: Master Oogway

quote: My time has come. You must continue your journey… without me. You must… believe.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Shifu, an acorn can only become the mighty oak, not a cherry tree. You must let her grow into what she will be.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Remember the path.
author: Master Oogway

quote: You’ve grown stronger.
author: Master Oogway

quote: It doesn’t. It helps me. And by helping me, you help yourself.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Who knows the ways of the universe? Accident? Or destiny? That is the secret.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Never stop. Never stop fighting. Never stop dreaming.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: He who fights, can lose. He who doesn’t fight, has already lost.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Get up, stand up, Stand up for your rights. Get up, stand up, Don't give up the fight.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Don't get tired of challenges. Make them tired of you.
author: Hiral Nagda

quote: Life is so precious! Live with love, joy, happiness, and abundance.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be grateful for every second of every day that you get to spend with people you love. Life is so very precious.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Life is pure adventure, and the sooner we realize that, the quicker we will be able to treat life as art.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Being alive is an infinite blessing. Appreciate life for what it is. Love what it is.
author: M. Sarada Devi

quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

quote: There is an unlimited power within you to do all that you want.
author: Hiral Nagda

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We all have an unsuspected reserve of strength inside that emerges when life puts us to the test.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Truth is so rare that it is delightful to tell it.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: A word is dead when it is said, some say. I say it just begins to live that day.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Love is anterior to life, posterior to death, initial of creation, and the exponent of breath.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Parting is all we know of heaven, and all we need of hell.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: That it will never come again is what makes life sweet.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The heart wants what it wants – or else it does not care.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I am out with lanterns, looking for myself.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: We turn not older with years but newer every day.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote:
In this short Life that only lasts an hour
How much - how little - is within our power.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote:
In this truth, in this faith, we trust.
For while we have our eyes on the future,
History has its eyes on us.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote:
Please.
Do not ask us who we are.
The hardest part of grief
Is giving it a name.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: Change is made of choices, & choices are made of character.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote:
Always remember that
What happened to us
Happened through us.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: We might not be fully sure of all that we are. & yet we have endured all that we were.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: Our scars are the brightest parts of us.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: The great responsibility I feel is to get people to put that power and that hope in themselves.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: Poetry and language are often at the heartbeat of movements for change.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: To love one another just may be the fight of our lives.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: Poetry has never been the language of barriers, it's always been the language of bridges.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: I was writing since I can remember - I just didn't know it was poetry yet, or that writing could be a career.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: What's really funny about being National Youth Poet Laureate is that not everyone even knows it exists.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: The oration of poetry, I consider to be its own art form and tradition.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I learned a long time ago the wisest thing I can do is be on my own side, be an advocate for myself and others like me.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I got my own back.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I am grateful to be a woman. I must have done something great in another life.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Loving someone liberates the lover as well as the beloved. And that kind of love comes with age.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I created myself. I have taught myself so much.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I'm not a writer who teaches. I'm a teacher who writes.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Every morning, I wake up saying, 'I’m still alive, a miracle.' And so I keep on pushing.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: For each new morning let there be flow of love. Let there be light of happiness in every direction.
author: Amit Ray

quote: The day will be what you make it, so rise, like the sun, and burn.
author: William C. Hannan

quote: If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.
author: J. M. Power

quote: If you’re absent during my struggle, don’t expect to be present during my success.
author: Will Smith

quote: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Toxic people will pollute everything around them. Don’t hesitate. Fumigate.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: I will not allow anyone to walk in my mind with dirty feet.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I love the sound of not hearing from some people.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Once you know your worth, no one can make you feel worthless.
author: Rashida Rowe

quote: Know your worth, hold your own power, be you.
author: Morgan Harper Nichols

quote: If you want to improve your self-worth, stop giving other people the calculator.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: You were born an original work of art. Stay original always. Originals cost more than imitations.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Go all in on yourself.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: The moment you feel like you have to prove your worth to someone is the moment to absolutely and utterly walk away.
author: Alysia Harris

quote: Retrieve your self-esteem so it is not dependent on how they do or don’t respond to you. You are enough. You are worthy.
author: Thema Bryant-Davis

quote: Your sense of self worth comes from you alone. Never the opinion of others.
author: Robert Greene

quote: In your own life it's important to know how spectacular you are.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Money can't buy life.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Man is a universe within himself.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Rastafari not a culture, it's a reality.
author: Bob Marley

quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
author: Bob Marley

quote: The day you stop racing is the day you win the race.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Reggae music is the purest music.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Rise up this mornin’, smile with the risin’ sun.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Don't forget your history nor your destiny.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
author: Bob Marley

quote: The most beautiful things are not perfect, they are special.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Don’t let them fool ya, or even try to school ya.
author: Bob Marley

quote: My music is colorful. The intention for it is to be good for whoever's listening to it, and my style is good for me.
author: Aminé

quote: I was just a huge fan of music, so that's how I learned how to rap.
author: Aminé

quote: I’m not afraid to be different, and I think that’s what sets me apart.
author: Aminé

quote: I try to make music that sounds like me, that sounds like my experiences.
author: Aminé

quote: I want to inspire people to be themselves and not be afraid to express themselves.
author: Aminé

quote: I’m trying to spread positivity through my music.
author: Aminé

quote: I want to make music that has a message behind it.
author: Aminé

quote: I want to make music that people can dance to, but also feel something.
author: Aminé

quote: I want to create a legacy that people will remember me by.
author: Aminé

quote: I believe that music has the power to bring people together.
author: Aminé

quote: I think it’s important to surround yourself with positive people who uplift you.
author: Aminé

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

quote: A disciplined mind brings happiness.
author: Buddha

quote: All experiences are preceded by mind, having mind as their master, created by mind.
author: Buddha

quote: Give, even if you only have a little.
author: Buddha

quote: Hatred is never appeased by hatred in this world. By non-hatred alone is hatred appeased. This is a law eternal.
author: Buddha

quote: Just as a solid rock is not shaken by the storm, even so the wise are not affected by praise or blame.
author: Buddha

quote: Resolutely train yourself to attain peace.
author: Buddha

quote: A true friend is one who stands by you in need.
author: Buddha

quote: If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart.
author: Buddha

quote: If you knew what I know about the power of giving, you would not let a single meal pass without sharing it in some way.
author: Buddha
